subject: Golf
United States Women's Open (Golf)
Masters Golf Tournament
Age, Chronological
lead_paragraph: Several trends in the golf world converged on the 18th green at Amata Spring Country Club in Thailand last Sunday when Guan Tianlang’s final five-foot par attempt disappeared into the hole.
snippet: Several trends in the golf world converged on the 18th green at Amata Spring Country Club in Thailand last Sunday when Guan Tianlang’s final five-foot par attempt disappeared into the hole.
